testcase.name: [It] SizingPolicy When virtual disks are applied checks VDs phases with map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-changing] and map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-creating] label
[It] SizingPolicy When virtual disks are applied checks VDs phases with map[vm:existing-vmclass] label
[It] SizingPolicy When virtual machines are applied checks VMs phases with map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-changing] and map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-creating] label
[It] SizingPolicy When virtual machines are applied checks VMs phases with map[vm:existing-vmclass] label

[It] SizingPolicy Not existing virtual machine class When virtual machine with label map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-changing] in phase Pending checks condition status before changing 'virtulaMachineCLass` field with existing class

[It] SizingPolicy Not existing virtual machine class When virtual machine with label map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-changing] in phase Pending changes VMClassName in VM specification with existing VMClass
[It] SizingPolicy Not existing virtual machine class When virtual machine with label map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-changing] in phase Pending checks VM phase and condition status after changing

[It] SizingPolicy Not existing virtual machine class When virtual machine with label map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-creating] in phase Pending checks condition status before creating `VirtualMachineClass`

[It] SizingPolicy Not existing virtual machine class When virtual machine with label map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-creating] in phase Pending changes VMClassName in VM specification with not existing VMClass which have correct prefix for creating
[It] SizingPolicy Not existing virtual machine class When virtual machine with label map[vm:not-existing-vmclass-with-creating] in phase Pending creates new `VirtualMachineClass`
